>>* Are there other articles or discussions of simulation convergence than*>>* John's Mardaljevic's excellent one in *Rendering with Radiance*?*


With the (big) chance of contributing something that's not useful, this
lecture deals with a Radiance equation, Monte Carlo sampling and
convergence, so I figured you might find it useful


http://www.cs.cornell.edu/courses/cs6620/2009sp/Lectures/Lec5_MonteCarlo_web.pdf


found on: (contains much more information in the form of lectures)


http://www.cs.cornell.edu/courses/cs6620/2009sp/schedule.html


Best Regards,
